channel.title: ~~~ help making a client please ~~~
channel.description:
I am trying to make a client for my server PicoScape. Problem is, I can't seem to get anything to work. I figured out how to use jar files. So using the standard 317 deod or whatever it is, I can compile it. But nothing happens when it is launched. I tryed googling all this, but nothing seems to help. I am able to compile other peoples clients, the work but don't connect to my server, nor theres.
I don't want to use someone else's client, or change someone elses work around. I want to make my own. But I need help, can anyone please help? Any kind of guide/tutorial anywhere? I already read everthing on this forum. So, anything external for help? Please anyone?

item.title: ~~~ help making a client please ~~~
item.dc:creator: @gman035t gman035t
item.description:

I am trying to make a client for my server PicoScape.
Problem is, I can’t seem to get anything to work. I figured out how to use jar files. So using the standard 317 deod or whatever it is, I can compile it. But nothing happens when it is launched. I don’t want to use someone else’s client, or change someone elses work around. I want to make my own. But I need help, can anyone please help? Any kind of guide/tutorial anywhere? I already read everthing on this forum. So, anything external for help? Please anyone?
